nodes.text: Snograth and the Mogwars was a band whose music was enjoyed by Taka Jamoreesa, who played it aboard their freighter Vermillion. Han Solo was irritated by the sound of the band's music, finding it unnecessary. After Fyzen Gor hijacked the Vermillion, Jamoreesa played the music to distract him while the Ewok slicer Peekpa ejected him out into space.
